short_summary: -Building Envelope Integrity, Cour suprême du Canada, 301 rue Wellington, Ottawa, Ontario
description: Gardening service for Supreme Court of Canada building
full_summary:
# Bid Opportunity: Building Envelope Integrity

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3619160742-Doc3619197182
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3619160742
* **Publication Date**: August 17, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 13, 2022, 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Amendment Date**: October 12, 2022

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 30, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: October 5, 2023
* **Location**: Canada, specifically the National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Procuring Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Scope of Work

The objective of this contract is to provide Building Envelope Integrity services for the Supreme Court of Canada.

### Notes to Bidders

* Please submit all required supporting documentation and bids by October 13, 2022, at 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.
* All bids should be submitted through SAP Ariba: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13860328

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Nabil Boujenoui, SPAC/PSPC
* **Email**: nabil.boujenoui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not available

### Trade Agreements

This procurement opportunity is open to Canadian bidders and incorporates the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Other Information

* The solicitation will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
* This opportunity is posted on Buyandsell and discovery.acrobat.com. Contract attachments are available from the PSPC.

### Post-Notification of Tender Closing:

Note: Please append the duration of tender closing period prior to posting on Buyandsell and this note will be omitted as once the time is past on the assigned date then this record was closed. If any reply went ahead would have voided another consideration. Let everyone know.
